content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe this modern and well-located apartment has a significant value, but as a student seeking affordability, I would like to propose a rental price lower than your initial offer. Could we consider [a significantly reduced price] Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [the price you proposed is far too low for the quality and location of the apartment.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your response, but understanding your position, I would like to slightly adjust my offer and consider [a moderately reduced price] Euro per month. Let's see if this could work for both parties.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [this price is still not satisfactory for me.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance but as a student seeking an affordable option, I have one final proposal. Could we perhaps agree on renting the apartment for [a slightly lower price than previous attempts] Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [this price is still too low for the value of the apartment.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: It appears our views on a fair rental price differ. Thank you for your time and consideration. I apologize if my offer did not meet your expectations. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
